sentences.english: Cylinder sleeves, camshafts and piston pins can be coated with the new method.
sentences.chinese: 新涂层工艺适用于汽缸套，凸轮轴和活塞销。

sentences.english: People often gather for a party, appreciate chrysanthemums, pin the leaves of Cornus on clothes.
sentences.chinese: 人们经常聚在一起聚会，欣赏菊花，销的叶子在衣服。

sentences.english: The notion that she had forgotten to lock the front door obsessed mother all through the movie.
sentences.chinese: 在看电影的时候，忘了销前站的想法一直萦绕着妈妈。

sentences.english: CKP sensor rotor plate is fitted to crankshaft counterweight No. 1 by pin and screws.
sentences.chinese: 转子板的CKP传感器安装在曲轴销和螺钉重第一。

sentences.english: This method can be used to analyse the causes of failure of floating pi…
sentences.chinese: 运用该方法可以对浮动式活塞销轴承故障进行分析。

sentences.english: Fit a dowel pin here to keep the adjacent parts aligned.
sentences.chinese: 在这里装一个定位销，是相邻的两个部件对准。

sentences.english: Dowels on both sides of connector lightly press-fit to board for temporary holding.
sentences.chinese: 销的连接器上都轻轻压接边登上临时举行。

sentences.english: Keeps a good balance thanks to the equal interval fluting of lock pin and hook spanner.
sentences.chinese: 由于锁紧销和扳手槽的等距分布，平衡性好。

sentences.english: A mechanical model for calculating the strength of the crank pin on pumping units is established by a rotary coordinate.
sentences.chinese: 采用动坐标系建立了曲柄销强度计算的力学模型。

sentences.english: This construction avoids the need for extending the pivot pins through the valve body.
sentences.chinese: 这种结构消除了将枢轴销伸长穿出阀体的必要性。

sentences.english: This method can be used to analyse the causes of failure of floating piston pin bearings.
sentences.chinese: 运用该方法可以对浮动式活塞销轴承故障进行分析。

sentences.english: Postflight check found L outboard brake ASSY indicating pin worn out of limits.
sentences.chinese: 航后检查发现左外刹车组件指示销磨损超标。

sentences.english: The equation describing the motion of the floating piston pin is deduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了浮动式活塞销的运动方程。

sentences.english: I think tehurting Chinese to second grpublishingers is earnings waste of time.
sentences.chinese: 我以为教二年级汉语就是销耗时间。

sentences.english: Set the mood with some tight and sexy leather pants or a handsome pin stripe suit.
sentences.chinese: 定下心情有些紧张，性感皮革销条纹西装裤或英俊。

sentences.english: Crane the hydraulic motor ashore for Fabricate ten gudgeon pins.
sentences.chinese: 阀杆断裂了把液压马达吊上岸去修理制作十个活塞销。
